data: “Now there was my cousin Eliza,” Miss Sally Ruth Dexter once said to me, "who was forced to make her home for thirty years in Vienna!
"Now there was my cousin Eliza," Miss Sally Ruth Dexter once said to me, "who was forced to make her home for thirty years in Vienna!
Slippy McGee, Sometimes Known as the Butterfly Man
